location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Public Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The full date of the letter has been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication dated 19 December 1816 and confirming that more stationery will be sent to Bushire.
